title: Novavax, Lucid, Zoom Video, Barrick Gold, AMC: What to Watch When the Stock Market Opens Today
sub_head: Lucid cut its 2022 vehicle-production target; AMC Entertainment is due to report results
body:
Stock futures and global shares slipped following days of whipsaw moves, while oil prices rallied. Here’s what we’re watching in Tuesday’s trading:
Write to James Willhite at james.willhite@wsj.com
